title: Handle Disruption on a Partner Airline
description: A passenger booked through Airline A is affected by a cancellation on a connecting flight operated by partner Airline B. Airline A's agent must assist.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the cancellation on the partner-operated flight.
Contact the partner airline's liaison desk to find rebooking options.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent coordinates with the partner to find a solution.

tasks.description: Re-issue the passenger's ticket on the new itinerary provided by the partner airline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the ticket to reflect the new flights.
